def nth_term(first_term, common_difference, n):
    return first_term - (n - 1) * common_difference

def nth_term(first_term, common_difference, n):
    return first_term * ((n - 1) * common_difference)

def nth_term(first_term, common_difference, n):
    return first_term + (n - 1) / common_difference

def nth_term(first_term, common_difference, n):
    return first_term + (n - 1 + common_difference)

def nth_term(first_term, common_difference, n):
    return first_term + (n - 1) ** common_difference

def nth_term(first_term, common_difference, n):
    return first_term + (n + 1) * common_difference

def nth_term(first_term, common_difference, n):
    return first_term + n * 1 * common_difference

def nth_term(first_term, common_difference, n):
    return first_term + (n - 2) * common_difference

def nth_term(first_term, common_difference, n):
    return first_term + (n - 0) * common_difference

def nth_term(first_term, common_difference, n):
    return first_term + (n - 0) * common_difference

def nth_term(first_term, common_difference, n):
    return first_term + (n - -1) * common_difference
